articles.author: Gloria Oladipo
articles.title: Outrage as Arkansas tells high schools to drop AP African American course - The Guardian US
articles.description: ‘Grave concern’ after latest example of conservative lawmakers limiting education on racial history
articles.content:
Advocacy groups are outraged after the Arkansas department of education warned state high schools not to offer an advanced placement course on African American history.
The admonition from Arkansas … [+8501 chars]
